overview:
Started off with the passion for entrepreneurship in the student days with the software startup Swades Solutions. Abhinav and 3 friends from the college gave shape to their entrepreneurial venture Innoz Tech. Innoz was instrumental in initiating the virtual incubation process in Technopark, Trivandrum. The student startup shot to fame with the launch of its first product SMSGYAN. An innovative service providing on demand information via sms. (www.smsgyan.com).

Shortlisted for ET Power of Ideas, Smsgyan is simple but very useful to the end user.

Innoz is now developing its second killer product for the mobile phones and is incubated under the iAccelerator program in IIMA.

Innoz was one of the 16 Finalists in the DFJ CISCO Global Business Plan Competition.

degrees.subject: Computer Science and Engg.
degrees.institution: LBS College of Engg., Kasaragod, Kerala
